query.statement: SELECT MAX(APRNK_S1) AS APRNK_S1 , MAX(APIRUM_S1) AS APIRUM_S1 , MAX(APDATE_S1) AS APDATE_S1 , MAX(APRNK_S2) AS APRNK_S2 , MAX(APIRUM_S2) AS APIRUM_S2 , MAX(APDATE_S2) AS APDATE_S2 , MAX(APRNK_S3) AS APRNK_S3 , MAX(APIRUM_S3) AS APIRUM_S3 , MAX(APDATE_S3) AS APDATE_S3 , MAX(APRNK_S4) AS APRNK_S4 , MAX(APIRUM_S4) AS APIRUM_S4 , MAX(APDATE_S4) AS APDATE_S4 , MAX(APRNK_S5) AS APRNK_S5 , MAX(APIRUM_S5) AS APIRUM_S5 , MAX(APDATE_S5) AS APDATE_S5 , MAX(APRNK_R1) AS APRNK_R1 , MAX(APIRUM_R1) AS APIRUM_R1 , MAX(APDATE_R1) AS APDATE_R1 , MAX(APRNK_R2) AS APRNK_R2 , MAX(APIRUM_R2) AS APIRUM_R2 , MAX(APDATE_R2) AS APDATE_R2 , MAX(APRNK_R3) AS APRNK_R3 , MAX(APIRUM_R3) AS APIRUM_R3 , MAX(APDATE_R3) AS APDATE_R3 , MAX(APRNK_R4) AS APRNK_R4 , MAX(APIRUM_R4) AS APIRUM_R4 , MAX(APDATE_R4) AS APDATE_R4 , MAX(APRNK_R5) AS APRNK_R5 , MAX(APIRUM_R5) AS APIRUM_R5 , MAX(APDATE_R5) AS APDATE_R5 FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = '1' THEN APRNK ELSE '' END AS APRNK_S1 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = '2' THEN APRNK ELSE '' END AS APRNK_S2 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = '3' THEN APRNK ELSE '' END AS APRNK_S3 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = '4' THEN APRNK ELSE '' END AS APRNK_S4 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = '5' THEN APRNK ELSE '' END AS APRNK_S5 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = '1' THEN APRNK ELSE '' END AS APRNK_R1 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = '2' THEN APRNK ELSE '' END AS APRNK_R2 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = '3' THEN APRNK ELSE '' END AS APRNK_R3 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = '4' THEN APRNK ELSE '' END AS APRNK_R4 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = '5' THEN APRNK ELSE '' END AS APRNK_R5 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = '1' THEN APIRUM ELSE '' END AS APIRUM_S1 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = '2' THEN APIRUM ELSE '' END AS APIRUM_S2 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = '3' THEN APIRUM ELSE '' END AS APIRUM_S3 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = '4' THEN APIRUM ELSE '' END AS APIRUM_S4 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = '5' THEN APIRUM ELSE '' END AS APIRUM_S5 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = '1' THEN APIRUM ELSE '' END AS APIRUM_R1 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = '2' THEN APIRUM ELSE '' END AS APIRUM_R2 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = '3' THEN APIRUM ELSE '' END AS APIRUM_R3 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = '4' THEN APIRUM ELSE '' END AS APIRUM_R4 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = '5' THEN APIRUM ELSE '' END AS APIRUM_R5 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = '1' THEN APDATE ELSE '' END AS APDATE_S1 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = '2' THEN APDATE ELSE '' END AS APDATE_S2 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = '3' THEN APDATE ELSE '' END AS APDATE_S3 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = '4' THEN APDATE ELSE '' END AS APDATE_S4 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'S' AND SEQNO = '5' THEN APDATE ELSE '' END AS APDATE_S5 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = '1' THEN APDATE ELSE '' END AS APDATE_R1 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = '2' THEN APDATE ELSE '' END AS APDATE_R2 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = '3' THEN APDATE ELSE '' END AS APDATE_R3 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = '4' THEN APDATE ELSE '' END AS APDATE_R4 , CASE WHEN APPGUBN = 'R' AND SEQNO = '5' THEN APDATE ELSE '' END AS APDATE_R5 FROM SAPHEE.ZWBAP02 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND DOCNO = #DOCNO# AND SEQSTAT = '3') WITH UR
